title: The Wire: Great Show or Greatest Show?
description:
Shukri and John discuss the legacy of The Wire. Was it great or was it the greatest show of all time? That question is discussed and The Class X guys try to figure out if the message of The Wire was as clear as contemporary analysts assume. If you enjoyed The Wire or love television analysis, check out this episode of The Class X Podcast. 

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/classxpodcast/message
